languages.text: "Я, как Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g} данного судна, снимаю запрет на взаимодействия с духом машины, подвергшимся поражению технохворью неизвестной категории. Дарую указанно{mf|му|й} мирян{mf|ину|ке} право доступа к мастер-когитатору Йота-IIIB под моим тщательным надзором в интересах познания и установления истины".

"As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."
languages.original_text: "Я, как Главный {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}технопровидец{/g} данного судна, снимаю запрет на взаимодействия с духом машины, подвергшимся поражению технохворью неизвестной категории. Дарую указанно{mf|му|й} мирян{mf|ину|ке} право доступа к мастер-когитатору Йота-IIIB под моим тщательным надзором в интересах познания и установления истины".

traits.locale_text: "As the High Enginseer of this vessel, I lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant the aforesaid {mf|layman|laywoman} the right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the procurement of knowledge and the establishment of truth."

languages.text: «Como {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g} primero de esta nave, por la presente levanto la prohibición de interactuar con el espíritu máquina que sufre una enfermedad tecnológica de categoría desconocida. Concedo a est{mf|e|a} laic{mf|o|a} privilegios de acceso al cogitador maestro Iota-IIIB bajo mi directa supervisión con el propósito de obtener información y establecer la verdad».
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."

traits.locale_text: «Como {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}visioingeniero{/g} primero de esta nave, por la presente levanto la prohibición de interactuar con el espíritu máquina que sufre una enfermedad tecnológica de categoría desconocida. Concedo a est{mf|e|a} laic{mf|o|a} privilegios de acceso al cogitador maestro Iota-IIIB bajo mi directa supervisión con el propósito de obtener información y establecer la verdad».

languages.text: 「本艦のメインの{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}として、カテゴリー不明の技術障害に罹患した機械精霊との交流禁止を解除する。私はこの{mf|l平信徒|平信徒}に、私の管理下で、知識を得て真実を確立する目的でマスター・コギテーターIota-IIIBにアクセスする権利を与える」
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."

traits.locale_text: 「本艦のメインの{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}機関整備師{/g}として、カテゴリー不明の技術障害に罹患した機械精霊との交流禁止を解除する。私はこの{mf|l平信徒|平信徒}に、私の管理下で、知識を得て真実を確立する目的でマスター・コギテーターIota-IIIBにアクセスする権利を与える」

languages.text: “机魂目前正在被某种未知类别的技术疾病折磨。然而，身为这艘飞船的主{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}，我在此解除禁止与机魂互动的禁令。我允许这位教外人士在我的严密监督下，出于获取知识、确认真理的目的，与主沉思者‘伊欧塔-IIIB’进行接触。”
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."

traits.locale_text: “机魂目前正在被某种未知类别的技术疾病折磨。然而，身为这艘飞船的主{g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}引擎先知{/g}，我在此解除禁止与机魂互动的禁令。我允许这位教外人士在我的严密监督下，出于获取知识、确认真理的目的，与主沉思者‘伊欧塔-IIIB’进行接触。”

languages.text: "Als {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} Primus dieses Schiffs hebe ich hiermit den Bann auf Interaktion mit dem Maschinengeist auf, der von einer Tech-Krankheit unbekannter Kategorie befallen wurde. Ich gewähre {mf|diesem Laien|dieser Laiin} Zugriff auf Meister-Cogitator Iota-IIIB unter meiner Aufsicht, um Wissen zu beschaffen und Wahrheit zu ermitteln."
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."

traits.locale_text: "Als {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Maschinenseher{/g} Primus dieses Schiffs hebe ich hiermit den Bann auf Interaktion mit dem Maschinengeist auf, der von einer Tech-Krankheit unbekannter Kategorie befallen wurde. Ich gewähre {mf|diesem Laien|dieser Laiin} Zugriff auf Meister-Cogitator Iota-IIIB unter meiner Aufsicht, um Wissen zu beschaffen und Wahrheit zu ermitteln."

languages.text: « En tant que {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} primus de ce vaisseau, je déclare caduque l'interdiction d'interagir avec l'esprit de la machine affecté par une techno-maladie de catégorie inconnue. J'accorde à {mf|ce|cette} profane le droit d'accès au maître-cogitateur Iota-IIIB sous ma supervision à des fins d'enquête et de recherche de la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."

traits.locale_text: « En tant que {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}technaugure{/g} primus de ce vaisseau, je déclare caduque l'interdiction d'interagir avec l'esprit de la machine affecté par une techno-maladie de catégorie inconnue. J'accorde à {mf|ce|cette} profane le droit d'accès au maître-cogitateur Iota-IIIB sous ma supervision à des fins d'enquête et de recherche de la vérité. »

languages.text: "Bu geminin {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Başmühedyumu{/g} olarak bilinmeyen kategoride bir tekno hastalığın tesiri altındaki makine ruhuyla etkileşim yasağını bundan böyle kaldırıyorum. Bu avam {mf|adamına|kadınına}, temkinli gözetimim altında bilgi temini ve hakikat tespiti amacıyla ana kavramsayar İota-IIIB'ye erişim yetkisi bahşediyorum."
languages.original_text: "As {g|Encyclopedia:Enginseer}Enginseer{/g} Prime of this vessel, I hereby lift the ban on interaction with the machine spirit that has been afflicted by a tech-ailment of unknown category. I grant this {mf|layman|laywoman} right of access to the master cogitator Iota-IIIB under my careful supervision for the purposes of procuring knowledge and establishing truth."
